comment: Absolute legend. Took him for 1101 and currently taking him for 1102 and he's amazing. My class was focused on movies which worked out for me as a film production major. Essay heavy but he grades them holistically and doesn't have a set rubric. Have a good paper and you'll get a 100.
He made class enjoyable and the assignments weren't that difficult. I enjoyed him so much that i took him.agin for 1102.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: He's a funny and caring professor that made the class enjoyable. He guided the class through his assignments step by step, made his lectures and in-class discussions enjoyable, and I liked him so much that I took his class for ENGL 1102.

He does a good job of making his lectures fun and none of his assignments are difficult. I had homework every week since we only met once a week but it was very manageable. He makes it clear what you need to do for large assignments and won't grade harshly so long as you meet the criteria he sets.

I had Professor Sutton for ENLG 1101 and liked his class so I also took him for ENGL 1102. Very funny man and does make lectures worth going to (attendance was mandatory). If you can TAKE HIM!! Honestly, it is very hard to fail his class. LASTLY, GO TO THE WRITING CENTER IT IS "FREE" AND WILL HELP YOU.

An amazing teacher, did not have any problems with him whatsoever. Thoroughly explains all the assignments. There are only three major assignments for this class, a few quizzes and discussion boards which are really easy. He gives at least three extra credit opportunities. He makes his classes very fun and entertaining.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Professor Sutton is great! He provides very clear guidelines and samples for each assignment, so it isn't difficult to do well. He's really nice, funny, and I actually enjoy going to his class. There aren't tests, only weekly discussion posts, reading quizzes, and 3 papers. I definitely recommend taking him!

Provides awesome feedback on all assignments and really cares for his students. Doesn't like easybib but really a great dude. Have to attend class bc it is only one a week but he makes it fun and usually lets out early.
TAKE HIM TAKe him you just need to take him I love him

Professor Sutton is a 10/10. His lectures were easy to follow and his commentary in class makes them enjoyable. His assignments are easy to complete and spaced out in a doable duration. He gave extra credit for every essay (up to 8 points!) and provided sample essays. Attendance is mandatory (missing two days is okay) and make sure to participate!
one of my favorite professors, love the guy, as long as you come to class and do the work you're good, W professor
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: By far the best professor I've taken. He definitely cares about you as a student and makes you feel welcomed and engaged in every class. He is funny and gives extra credit for every essay, he gives good feedback after grading. As long as you do the work and go to class you'll do great!

Conner Sutton is a fantastic professor. He's super funny, keeps the class engaged, and clearly cares about his students. Weekly assignments+ 3 major papers, all are easy if you follow the rubric and examples he gives. Provides multiple opportunities for extra credit and has clear and fair grading. Highly recommend!
Professor Sutton is a great professor and is very funny! I would recommend him because he actually cares for his students well being and give you enough time to do any work that is given. Take him.

Gives good feedback on assignments. Keeps class entertaining, down to earth. Offers extra credit for assignments. All you have to do is show up to class and know the deadlines to things. Everything is talked about in class and he is willing to help.
The greatest teacher I have ever had. He is young and truly cares for his student's well being. He made English fun and truly the easiest class you will take all of college. 100% recommend

Conner is an amazing teacher to take. He was very understanding of me and my ability to turn in work sometimes and has a really lax late policy that still gives you time to finish up to three days late! All of his assignments and their criteria are listed out well and easy to understand with examples given!! He helped me enjoy writing more!

Literally the best english professor. He is super kind and funny. Took him for an 8 am in the spring and he made it enjoyable. He lets you pick whatever topic you want to write about for your 3 major assignments and the rest of the grades are primarily based on participation. Truly a 10/10 professor.

Really great professor! Textbook IS required, and quizzes based off of it are open book so if you can, get the book. Papers are graded holistically. He's a really thoughtful grader though; if you put effort in, you'll most likely do well. Definitely try to take Prof. Sutton.

Nice and funny in class. HOWEVER. attendance is like half of your grade, which I deem unreasonable. Papers don't really have a clear graded rubric or system but he's willing to talk about details in your paper with you. If you are an extrovert who will show up to class everyday then you will be fine.

Professor Sutton was an extremely good english teacher, if you have the opportunity to take him please do. He gives out extra credit for every paper, he has quizzes that are based off the textbook that you can get online for free and the quizzes are open note. he is really helpful and understanding.

Professor Sutton is the nicest person ever! He is so compassionate and you can tell he cares about the student. He grades very specifically, but literally everything you need will be in the rubric. He even posts samples for you to look at to help guide your writing. He also allows 3 days to miss class which is perfectly reasonable.

love him! he makes class worthwhile and doesn't hesitate to help in any way he can. there are easy quizzes, discussion posts that really help in the end, and no tests. he grades in a timely manner and if for any reason he takes too long, he will point it out and apologize. his feedback is great and will help you in anything you need. take him!!

I love this professor! The class schedule is posted at the beginning of the semester and hardly changes: three big assignments, weekly SHORT in-class writings, EASY reading quizzes, and HELPFUL discussion questions. PARTICIPATION IS MANDATORY! There are easy points to miss that are only mentioned in class! He is EASY to contact outside of class!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Professor Sutton has been my favorite professor this year. He makes sure you understand the work and gives extra credit and responds to emails quickly. He's very funny and makes sure that you put yourself before anything else in his class.

Professor Sutton is hands down the best professor I've ever had. He is absolutely amazing and doesn't give tests. The weekly assignments were really easy and you can do most of them in class. He goes over anything you ask him to go over. He keeps his grading up to date and if he doesn't, he makes it a point to apologize. Take him you wont regret!!!

Sutton is a really caring English professor. He gives great feedback to your papers and also gives a lot of extra credit assignments. He is a funny professor as well and really connects with his students. I would definitely recommend taking him for any English class.

Cannot say enough good things abt prof Sutton. Literally my favorite class ever, taking him again next semester. He gives extra credit on every paper and reading quizzes were open book. Love this man so much. You'll never find a professor like him. Take his class u won't regret it.
The best professor you'll have in college. He really cares about his students and tries making it very easy for his students to pass.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Fantastic, relatable teacher who gives good feedback and fair grades.

Prof. Sutton is by far the BEST teacher I have ever had. You can really tell he cares about his students and seeing them succeed. He manages to challenge you without giving too much work or making it too hard. If you're looking for a GREAT teacher and a good experience do not hesitate to take his class. you won't regret it.
The class was easy if you showed up and did your work. He really does care about his students and I wish I could take another class with him, even if I didn't need it!

LITERALLY, The Best Professor Ever!! There are reading quizzes due every Sunday but we go over them on the Friday before the quiz. Only 3 papers. Let's you choose your topic. It can be anything from your favorite cereal to how the universe was born. My least stressful class in this semester and perhaps all of my college.
God I love this man. If I could take him again I absolutely, without a doubt would. Plleeeeeeaaaaase sign up for his class if you have the option, he is god tier.

Professor Sutton really cares about each individual student. My class was 100% online due to COVID, and he made online learning very approachable. He gives very detailed feedback on each paper you submit. There are several opportunities for extra credit. I cannot say enough good things about Professor Sutton. His classes fill up quick!

Saying Professor Sutton is an inspiration is an understatement. Never a boring moment in his class. Hes so passionate. Hes sense of humor: Comedy Gold. I would take him again in a heart beat. He helped me find my confidence. I not only see him as a great professor but also my father. Like Prof Sutton always says The pen is always WRITE!
Awesome professor. Genuinely cares about not only the course work but his students.

Definitely recommend Professor Sutton! (ENGL 1101) He's very chill and has a fun class. He's not strict and understands that life happens. The class work is easy and he really helps you and does what he can for you to do great in his class. You can tell he cares about his students a lot. He's good at answering emails in a timely manner too!

This teacher is not another drone. He's new but he's amazing, gives great feedback, and thinks of his students as people. I had him online due to covid, and he made this class my favorite for this semester.

professor sutton is THE BEST if you have the chance please take him. gives great feedback on essays, super funny, really great lectures. hes everything you want in a teacher and makes english fun!!!!!!!
He's great. You can really tell her cares about his students and isn't out to tank anyone's GPA. Wonderful for English 1101! Any freshman would be super lucky to have him as a professor.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Super good professor! Hes nice and will help you improve without hurting your grade.
Professor Sutton is an amazing professor that genuinely cares about his students, wants to help, gives great feedback, and makes the class enjoyable.
